law.catch_line: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, the Board of Appeals shall adopt reasonable re...

text.section: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, the Board of Appeals shall adopt reasonable regulations, in accordance with § 10-206 of the State Government Article, to govern appeals and hearings under this subtitle.
Section 10-206(e) of the State Government Article does not apply to regulations adopted under this section.
